lead_paragraph: Nikita Kamayev, former head of Russia's Anti-Doping Agency, approached the Sunday Times before his death offering to expose the country's secret development of performance-enhancing drugs, the newspaper has reported.

headline.print_headline: Late Russian Anti-Doping Agency Boss Was Set to Expose True Story: Report
headline.main: Late Russian Anti-Doping Agency Boss Was Set to Expose True Story: Report

snippet: Nikita Kamayev, former head of Russia's Anti-Doping Agency, approached the Sunday Times before his death offering to expose the country's secret development of performance-enhancing drugs, the newspaper has reported....
